title: Episode 183: Repair and Re-parent with Dr. Becky Kennedy
itunes:title: Episode 183: Repair and Re-parent with Dr. Becky Kennedy
itunes:subtitle: Kate lives the life of the rich and famous and gets two facials in one week, and Doree pays the piper and finishes her taxes. Then, they welcome Dr. Becky Kennedy, clinical psychologist and host of the podcast Good Inside, to the pod to talk about how ...
description:
Kate lives the life of the rich and famous and gets two facials in one week, and Doree pays the piper and finishes her taxes. Then, they welcome Dr. Becky Kennedy, clinical psychologist and host of the podcast Good Inside, to the pod to talk about how her life has changed since she started her Instagram a year and half ago, why some of her biggest fans are not actually parents, and how behavior-first and person-first parenting methods really differ.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter 


This episode is sponsored by:
